channel.title: CVE Feed for org.opencrx -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for org.opencrx -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-25959|2024-09-16T19:24:15.717Z -- org.opencrx -- opencrx-core-config
item.description: In OpenCRX, versions v4.0.0 through v5.1.0 are vulnerable to reflected Cross-site Scripting (XSS), due to unsanitized parameters in the password reset functionality. This allows execution of external javascript files on any user of the openCRX instance.
